```{r, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}

library(infographiq)
```

```{r}
tryCatch(plot_timeseries(
csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/RVC/blob/master/reef_fish_biodiversity/domain_fk_abun_diversity.csv",
title   = "Reef fish Richness",
y_label = "Species Richness",
skip    = 0,
filter  = NULL,
col_t   = "year",
col_y   = "richness"),
error = function(e) e)
```
